entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 18.
